heading: Aspect of the Rampaging Werebeast â€“ Diablo 4 Druid Legendary Aspect
content: Aspect of the Rampaging Werebeast is a Druid Offensive Aspect that can be found by completing the Dungeon as well as from random enemy drops. After clearing the Dungeon for the first time the Aspect will be available in your Codex of Power. Legendary Aspects can change the way skills and builds work in significant ways. increase while is active is and stacks up to 99. This means that the maximum stat you can get out of this is 990% when reaching 99 stacks.
